item.title: How to publish a blog on GitHub Pages with Hugo and GitHub Actions
item.description: I decided to start a new blog and, after looking at many of the available options for blogging, I chose a static site generator. I had used Jekyll in the past, but this time I wanted to try something new, so I gave Hugo a try. I also wanted to publish this blog to GitHub Pages whenever I push new content to the GitHub repo. So in this blog post I describe how I’m using it along with GitHub actions to automatically deploy this blog to GitHub Pages.
